title: Delegation of responsibilities
context: ยง352-30 Delegation of responsibilities. The director may delegate any of the director&rsquo;s responsibilities pursuant to this chapter to a representative of the department except those that relate to discretionary discharge before the term of the person&rsquo;s commitment has ended. [L 1980, c 303, pt of ยง8(1); am L 1981, c 19, ยง1]
